content.query:
USE NYC_Taxi_Serverless
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSV_File_Format
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
        ,STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
        ,FIRST_ROW = 2
        ,USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE -- True Replaces NULLs w/ Default Values
        ,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
        ,PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
)
